name: World Obesity and Weight Management Congress
content: WOC 2021 is global platform to update and exchange the knowledge and expertise on Obesity and Weight Management. We are very excited to invite participants from all over the world to “World Obesity and Weight Management Congress” (WOC 2021) organized at Orlando, USA on October 18-20, 2021 with theme " Advanced Concepts in Treatment and Prevention of Obesity". Join us to preserve, promote and strengthen the nature based healing strategies and its magical cure. WOC 2021 consists of a lecture, presentation, workshop, and seminars from the experts, doctors, professors, dedicated professionals, scientists and young scholars.
